hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the application database

port.description: The port number of the application database

username.description: The username to use when connecting to the application database

password.description: The password to use when connecting to the application database. Developers are strongly encouraged to use environment variable substitution to avoid storing secrets in source.

connectionTimeoutMillis.description: The number of milliseconds the system waits before timing out when connecting to the application database

app_db_name.description: The name of the application database

sys_db_name.description: The name of the system database

ssl_ca.description: If using SSL/TLS to securely connect to a database, path to an SSL root certificate file

app_db_client.description: Specify the database client to use to connect to the application database

migrate.description: Specify a list of user DB migration commands to run

rollback.description: Specify a list of user DB rollback commands to run

addContextMetadata.description: Adds contextual information, such as workflow UUID, to each log entry

logLevel.description: A filter on what logs should be printed to the standard output

silent.description: Silences the logger such that nothing is printed to the standard output

enabled.description: Whether or not to export traces in Open Telemetry format

endpoint.description: The FQDN of a Jaeger endpoint.
